Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
